title: Two Canadians jailed in China mark 500 days in confinement - The Globe and Mail
description: Michael Kovrig and Michael Spavor detained since December, 2018, in what is widely seen as retaliation for Canada’s arrest of Huawei Technologies Co. Ltd. executive Meng Wanzhou
content:
Experts say Ottawa shouldn't expect Beijing to do it any favours and free Michael Kovrig and Michael Spavor in return for medical co-operation on the coronavirus. Kovrig (left) and Spavor are shown in these 2018 images taken from video. 
/The Associated Pres… [+7770 chars]
